"Prayer is not asking. It is a longing of the soul." - Mahatma Gandhi

Description: Morning exercise to awaken the body.

Description: Second 4-hour sleep slot for rest and rejuvenation.

Activity: Freshen up and think about life
Motivational Quote: "Reflection is the lamp of the heart. If it departs...  the heart will have no light." - Ali ibn Abi Talib
"To be in ‘Asr is to be in the presence of the Divine."
"Recite the Quran; for on the Day of Resurrection it will come as an intercessor for those who recite It." - Prophet Muhammad (SAW)

"Night is the time to recollect the thoughts of the day and seek divine guidance."

Description: Discussing friend's startup ideas and progress.
Motivational Quote: "Good ideas come from bad ideas...  but only if there are enough of them." - Seth Godin
